00161 //----------------------------------------------------------
00162 void
00163 GrTextureSet::Update() const
00164 {
00165         float rotate = 0.0f;
00166         float rotateCenterS = 0.0f;
00167         float rotateCenterT = 0.0f;
00168         float scaleS = 1.0f;
00169         float scaleT = 1.0f;
00170         float translateS = 0.0f;
00171         float translateT = 0.0f;
00172 
00173         if ( _rotateExpr )
00174                 rotate = DegToRad( _rotateExpr->GetValue() );
00175 
00176         if ( _stRotateCenterExpr[ 0 ] )
00177                 rotateCenterS = _stRotateCenterExpr[ 0 ]->GetValue();
00178 
00179         if ( _stRotateCenterExpr[ 1 ] )
00180                 rotateCenterT = _stRotateCenterExpr[ 1 ]->GetValue();
00181 
00182         if ( _stScaleExpr[ 0 ] )
00183                 scaleS = _stScaleExpr[ 0 ]->GetValue();
00184 
00185         if ( _stScaleExpr[ 1 ] )
00186                 scaleT = _stScaleExpr[ 1 ]->GetValue();
00187 
00188         if ( _stTranslateExpr[ 0 ] )
00189                 translateS = _stTranslateExpr[ 0 ]->GetValue();
00190 
00191         if ( _stTranslateExpr[ 1 ] )
00192                 translateT = _stTranslateExpr[ 1 ]->GetValue();
00193 
00194         float cosTheta = Cos( rotate );
00195         float sinTheta = Sin( rotate );
00196 
00199         _matrix[ 0 ] = cosTheta * scaleS;
00200         _matrix[ 1 ] = -sinTheta * scaleS;
00201         _matrix[ 2 ] = 0.0f;
00202         _matrix[ 3 ] = translateS;
00203         
00205         _matrix[ 4 ] = sinTheta * scaleT;
00206         _matrix[ 5 ] = cosTheta * scaleT;
00207         _matrix[ 6 ] = 0.0f;
00208         _matrix[ 7 ] = translateT;
00209 
00211         _matrix[ 3 ] -= cosTheta * rotateCenterS + -sinTheta * rotateCenterT;
00212         _matrix[ 7 ] -= sinTheta * rotateCenterS + cosTheta * rotateCenterT;
00213         _matrix[ 3 ] += rotateCenterS;
00214         _matrix[ 7 ] += rotateCenterT;
00215 }
00216 
00217 //----------------------------------------------------------
00218 void
00219 GrTextureSet::ApplyGlobalState( GrShader* shader ) const
00220 {
00222         shader->SetEngineParam4x2fv( GrShader::EP_TEXTURE_MATRIX, _matrix );
00223 }

00226 void
00227 GrTextureSet::ApplyStageState( ESTAGE stage, unsigned int glTextureUnit, GrShader* shader, GrShader::EPARAM colorReg0, GrShader::EPARAM colorReg1 ) const
00228 {
00229         _stages[ stage ].ApplyShaderState( shader, colorReg0, colorReg1 );
00230         _stages[ stage ].BindTexture( glTextureUnit );
00231 }

00234 void
00235 GrTextureSet::ApplyStageState( ESTAGE stage, unsigned int glTextureUnit ) const
00236 {
00237         _stages[ stage ].BindTexture( glTextureUnit );
00238 }

00253 //----------------------------------------------------------
00254 void
00255 GrTextureSet::Init()
00256 {
00258         MemSet( _matrix, 0, sizeof( _matrix ) );
00259         _matrix[ 0 ] = 1.0f;
00260         _matrix[ 5 ] = 1.0f;
00261 }
00262 
00263 //----------------------------------------------------------
00264 void
00265 GrTextureSet::Assign( const GrTextureSet& textureSet )
00266 {
00267         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < ES_COUNT; ++i )
00268                 _stages[ i ] = textureSet._stages[ i ];
00269 
00270         _rotateExpr = textureSet._rotateExpr;
00271         _stScaleExpr[ 0 ] = textureSet._stScaleExpr[ 0 ];
00272         _stScaleExpr[ 1 ] = textureSet._stScaleExpr[ 1 ];
00273         _stTranslateExpr[ 0 ] = textureSet._stTranslateExpr[ 0 ];
00274         _stTranslateExpr[ 0 ] = textureSet._stTranslateExpr[ 0 ];
00275 
00276         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; ++i )
00277                 _matrix[ i ] = textureSet._matrix[ i ];
00278 }
